Reviews.Title: Disappointed...again.
Reviews.Author: JHagel
Reviews.Content: When the second bullet under "Product Features" boasts compatibility with iPhones/iPads so you can share content over this camera's projector, I would hope that is a real possibility.  When I got the camera, there was no information about this feature, and no cords in the box.  I looked online to see if there was a cord I could purchase, and had no luck.  I finally found Q&A; on the Nikon website that answered my question:"The F8Z361-NK Dock Connector Cable was only available as a promotional item with the COOLPIX S1200pj for a limited period. It is not available from Nikon as a sales item."If the cable is no longer available, then HOW can iPhone compatibility be the 2nd greatest feature of this product?Aside from this disappointment, the camera is easy to use, and the project feature is very cool.Update: The camera broke after 6 months of light use. It makes a terrible noise when you turn it on/off, and the auto-focus stopped working. It is still under the Nikon warranty, but shipping isn't covered, so this little camera keeps costing more and more. Not a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Good Things do Come in Small Packages.
Reviews.Author: JAMES WEATHERS
Reviews.Content: As an owner of a wide range of Nikon products, I had no doubt about the physical quality of the camera nor its lenses. Never having seen a camera/projector previously, I was a little apprehensive about this product.  I worried needlessly as I soon discovered that all of its advertised features performed as promised.  Should have know to second guess NIKON!! This is an extremely handy camera/projector ideal for vacations.

Reviews.Title: A camera can't do full features due to lacking cable!
Reviews.Author: Y. Cheng
Reviews.Content: Camera description and title says it could link to ipad/iphone or other Apple products to broadcast slides from them.  However, it came in WITHOUT the cable, which says it should be within the package in TITLE!!!! Very shocking!  It is a hard finding cable, as Belkin stopped making them!  You will loss the feature of this camera without the cable! Be careful!

Reviews.Title: Impressive Innovation, many improvements , GREAT internal Sound
Reviews.Author: M. Gehret "G-Man  Colorado"
Reviews.Content: Nikon hit another one out of the park with this final model, the S1200pj digital projector camera.  I really like the S1000pj with its nicely built, solid construction and features. The second in this series is the S1100pj which offered touch screen functions, But the S1200pj offers a larger 3" screen, quick movie botton (rear) and two additional features that are important : The fill movie light (that throws a"fill light" on subjects as well as improved low-light conditions). The other, is the wind reduction setting when outdoor..and EZ projector activation by simply sliding the dust cover in front.I read a lot of reviews regarding this model and their unfair comments..(regarding Nikon not including the cable for iphones  .However,  one can connect the camera to a laptop however, newer PC's have HDMI, via  HDTV) .  So ratings took a beating when Nikon decided to end the cables for Iphones.  What they missed was the unique useful camera. Nikon improved the projector on this particular model by installing DLP technology which projects 20 lumens and longer battery life, (less power required for projecting images or movies). If you can get this camera at the right price and by an authorized Nikon dealer, this will come with a 90 day warranty from defects. I gladly give this model a 5 Star due to the many impressive improvements as well as print quality and video improvements as well .  Nikon did a good job with their final release of the projector digital camera/video compact camera. Lastly..Some have complained that pictures are out of focus. I have learned that by changing the setting to Scene Mode, the system works faster, sharper imaging and great photos. User's need to try different settings first, before making misleading reviews. The camera is great for video projections and in group gatherings .  Job well done Nikon !

Reviews.Title: Great camera and projector
Reviews.Author: Tester 90
Reviews.Content: The camera is fine, I didn't really even buy this camera to use as a camera. I bought it to use as a projector, which is GREAT...IF you have a dark room and a white wall. And honestly even in somewhat lighted rooms I can still see the projections just fine.My camera came with the cords that work great with my iPod touch. It's easy to setup and use.The only real problem I have is the volume...it's not really loud. If you watch a movie by yourself and its in a quiet room, then you might be able to hear everything...but if you are trying to project a movie you bought from iTunes for a room of people...GOOD LUCK!If anyone knows of something you can hook up and/or use to make the camera louder, or an adapter for some speakers; PLEASE let me know.That being said, the camera is great for a all around pocket camera/point and shoot. Also it's great as a projector. For viewing photos and movies, etc...but the sound is not up to par with the rest of this camera/projector.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix S1200pj projection camera
Reviews.Author: D.F.
Reviews.Content: Love this camera so far, still getting to know all the features of this camera, picture quality is great, also using the camera is simple, when i finish taking pictures, the fact that i can project the pictures on a wall for all to see is when the real fun start. i definitely will recommend this camera to all.

Reviews.Title: Not my favorite camera
Reviews.Author: jj
Reviews.Content: It is a very convenient size for travel but I am not necessarily impressed wit the quality that I get. I do not like having to constantly change the shooting mode to get quality

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Edris Rebecca Barnick
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use for art purposes, but I am using for business right now.  It takes great pictures, and I love the projector feature. I can take hand held pictures of documents and drivers licenses, and they come out clear and printable.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Franklin D. Rucker "Frank Dale"
Reviews.Content: I wasn't' sure that this camera would live up to expectations, but it turned out to be even better. The projected image was clear up to at least the size of one square foot.I am very happy with it and it's easy to use, both as a camera and projector.

Reviews.Title: 122pj
Reviews.Author: Tesser
Reviews.Content: This camera works great. They advertise that you can plug your iPhone in and watch a movie that's the reson I bought it. Now they don't have the plug to do that so it's a waist for me. Wish now I had not bought it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: STANLEY D FAULKNER
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA! REPLACES MY 1000PJ.ONLY PROBLEM, I DIDN'T GET THE COLOR I ORDERED.I CAN LIVE WITH IT.I RECOMEND THIS TO EVERYONE. GREAT PROJECTOR.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures but what I really got it for was the built in projector. Works good and beats having to carry around a CD and sometimes player in order to show off the pictures from our trips. It also came with plugs to use with your I products so now I can show off things from my iPad/iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Features missing !
Reviews.Author: Marlene E. Bryant "Garden bird"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera ONLY for the advertised feature that it could be connected to the iPad, iPhone, etc.  Well, no cable, means no way to connect !!!  As others have said, you can't find that cable anywhere !!  Either delete that part from the product description, and or give us a refund.  Very surprised, and very disappointed with Nikon for doing this !  Shame on you Nikon !!  There goes your good name.  :-(  I have other Nikons, and many other cameras, so I am not a newbie !  This was just a fun camera to have, but now it's just another pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera features, need perfection
Reviews.Author: Data7
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera and comes with nice features. I got it for a deal w/o cable F8s361nk. Contacted Nikon and felt poor support regarding the cable. Finally bought the cable in eBay ( very few available as Belkin stopped manufacturing). The set up was easy and amazing features

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S1200 Projector Camera
Reviews.Author: J Chase Mattillo
Reviews.Content: The Coolpix S1200pj has one feature that I absolutely love - the built in projector.  I have been spoiled using an SLR digital, which provides with a higher price higher quality images, which this camera is not able to match.  However, the camera for a point and shoot is fun, easy to use and store in my purse for everyday photo opportunities.  The vendor did an excellent job of providing fast and easy service.  The camera came within a two days, actually December 24th, in the midst of the busy holiday season.  The price was also excellent and much less than any other vendor prices.Joanne, Los Angele

Reviews.Title: Great idea...nice camera
Reviews.Author: Peter Sindo "BIGRUCK-US"
Reviews.Content: Got this for $123.00 at BB...it was a great deal and I needed a new camera.  The Nikon s1200pj camera is a nice compact camera...it is well made and the projector is very handy...works great and has a good image viewing.  The camera has an easy to use menu to navigate with and has a large viewing LCD.  Camera come with the battery, charger, strap and software..UPDATE..JUST BOUGHT THE CABLE TO USE WITH MY TV..OR IPHONE...ONLY ONE LEFT...1/6/13...

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX S1200pj
Reviews.Author: Welester
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted one of these camaras for her own but with more style and this camara fit the bill .

Reviews.Title: coolpix s 1200pj digitaL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: johannes buiteweg
Reviews.Content: it was an christmas gift for my wifeand she has not used it. my rating is totally based on the projection feature of the camera

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever! $4.99 disposable is better
Reviews.Author: Allan Paradise "Living in Paradise"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's birthday when the 1200 just came out, and she had to send it in for repair because 50% or more of the pictures were blurry. After getting it back, the same problems occurred and after a dozen phone calls, she gave up and asked if she could give it back to me and get another camera. I hardly use it but after taking pictures of New Years Eve 2013 and looking at the photos, 70% are blurry and useless. That was with good indoor lighting. Into the junk draw!!

Reviews.Title: sdm
Reviews.Author: S. Master
Reviews.Content: Other than reaction timing, it's a great camera.  The video, the sound are great, but the projection did meet expectation.

Reviews.Title: really cool
Reviews.Author: sxyfz
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S1200pj 14.1 MP Digital Camera with Built-In 20 Lumens iPhone/iPad/iPod Compatible Projector and Connector Cable (Black). really cool video projector

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 20 Lumen projector enables instant viewing of still images and movies
Compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, iPod nano and iPod photo to project content from your device
14.1 effective megapixel CCD sensor for beautiful image quality
5x optical Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens 28-140mm (35mm equivalent) for superior image quality
One-touch HD (720p) movie recording with optical zoom and stereo sound
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX S1200pj 14.1 MP Digital Camera with Built-In 20 Lumens iPhone/iPad/iPod Compatible Projector
